description:
An old nemesis sees through Luffy`s disguise, Zoro finally catches up to the sword-stealing fairy, and Sanji`s skill at sniffing out snipers impresses his new lady friend!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des retrouvailles fatidiques. Bellamy la Hyène !
The Fateful Reunion! Bellamy the Hyena!
Unmei no Saikai: Hyena no Bellamy
運命の再会 ハイエナのベラミー
